successes.title: Onewheel :: The Self-Balancing Electric Skateboard
successes.description: Onewheel: the revolutionary electric boardsport that gives you the feeling of flying

Pledges.description: RESPECT - Your name appears in perpetuity on the Onewheel Visionaries section of our website.
STICK IT - Durable, UV safe vinyl Onewheel logo decal. Stick it on your board, your lid, or wherever!
DREAM  IT - Onewheel poster (12"x24"). Pin it on your bedroom wall and dream about riding Onewheel. We do.
CAP IT - Onewheel Flexfit hat. Black. Universal fit.
WEAR IT - Onewheel logo T-shirt. Black. High quality cotton.
HOODIE IT - Onewheel logo hoodie. Black. Great for night rides. High quality cotton.
EARLY BIRDS - Help us get started! Free shipping to USA. (Add $100 for shipping to Canada. International, HI and AK shipping varies.)
ONEWHEEL - a Onewheel from the first production run. Includes Standard Charger. Free shipping to USA. (Add $100 for shipping to Canada. International, HI and AK shipping varies.)

ONEWHEEL + ULTRA CHARGER - a Onewheel from the first production run plus upgrade to High-Speed charger (20 minutes for full charge)! Free shipping to USA. (Add $100 for shipping to Canada. International, HI and AK shipping varies.)

ONEWHEEL CUSTOM EDITION + ULTRA CHARGER - Only on Kickstarter: get your Onewheel in limited edition ELECTRIC PINK or MATTE BLACK color options, plus free upgrade to High-Speed Charger (20 minutes for full charge)! Free shipping to USA. (Add $100 for shipping to Canada. International, HI and AK shipping varies.)
ONEWHEEL + ULTRA CHARGER + GET IT EARLY! - a Onewheel from the first production run (blue) plus upgrade to High-Speed charger (20 minutes for full charge)! SF Bay Area residents only.

ONEWHEEL + ULTRA CHARGER + GET IT EARLY + MEET THE TEAM! - a Onewheel from the first production run (blue) plus upgrade to High-Speed charger (20 minutes for full charge)! Free shipping to USA. Plus visit the Onewheel team in Mt View and see where it all happens. You're responsible for your own transportation to the bay area. We'll buy the coffee. (Add $100 for shipping to Canada. International, HI and AK shipping varies.)
